sourcesContent:
import * as React from "react"
import {
  ChakraProvider,
  CSSReset,
  Box,
  Grid,
  GridItem
} from "@chakra-ui/core"
import theme from "@chakra-ui/theme"

import { Header } from './components/Header';
import { Menu } from './components/Menu';

export const App = () => (
  <ChakraProvider theme={theme}>
    <CSSReset />
    <Box textAlign="center" fontSize="md" bg="f6f6f6">
      <Header />
      <Grid templateColumns="repeat(4, 1fr)" gap={4} minW="960px" maxW="1120px" w="100%" mx="auto" minH="800px">
        <GridItem colSpan={1}>
          <Menu />
        </GridItem>
        <GridItem colSpan={3} bg="papayawhip" />
      </Grid>
    </Box>
  </ChakraProvider>
)
